name: LOVEVOOK Carry On Luggage 22x14x9 Airline Approved, 22 Inch Softside Suitcases with Spinner Wheels, Lightweight Carry-on Suitcase with TSA Lock for Women Men, Large Luggage for Travel Business Trip
short_description: 【AIRLINE APPROVED DIMENSIONS】Measuring 22 x 14 x 9 inches (Includes wheels), case dimensions: 18.7 x 14 x 9 inches, weighing 6.9 pounds, this lightweight carry on luggage fits perfectly in the overhead bin of most airlines. Ideal for your business trip and stress-free travel.

【Durable & Smooth-Silent Mobility】Made from premium water- and scratch-resistant polyester, this soft carry-on luggage withstands travel rigors. Its 360° silent spinner wheels feature a precision shaft and thickened design for wear resistance, quiet operation, and superior load capacity.

【Spacious & Well-Organized】 This travel luggage is thoughtfully designed with a dedicated waterproof wet pocket to separate damp items, a roomy main compartment with secure adjustable straps, plus 3 front compartments and 1 side pocket—keeping all your travel essentials neatly arranged and easily accessible throughout your journey.

【FRONT LAPTOP COMPARTMENT】The exterior laptop compartment provides quick, hassle-free access to your 15.6'' laptop and tablet, featuring a padded sleeve for extra protection while maintaining a sleek profile, making your rolling carry-on suitcase an indispensable companion for business trips and on-the-go workspace solutions.

【Premium Accessories】The smooth yet durable heavy-duty zipper with reinforced teeth prevents bursting, the TSA-approved combination lock ensures security and convenience, multi-level ergonomic telescopic handle for customized height, top and side grab handles provide versatile carrying alternatives.

【Exceptional Customer Support】At LOVEVOOK, we combine rigorous quality testing with outstanding care. Every suitcase exceeds industry standards, ensuring reliability for all your travels. Should questions arise, our dedicated team provides prompt solutions—because your journey deserves confidence from trusted quality.

Each suitcase features an expandable design for added packing capacity, so you never have to leave essentials behind. With smart features and durable construction, the Amsterdam Collection is your reliable companion for every journey.

name: Travelpro Maxlite 5 Softside Expandable Luggage with 4 Spinner Wheels, Lightweight Suitcase, Men and Women, Slate Green, Carry-on 21-Inch
short_description: LIGHTWEIGHT: A half pound lighter than Maxlite 4, this spinner meets most international carry-on size limits. Case Dimensions: 21" x 14" x 9" | Overall Dimensions (includes wheels and handles): 23 x 14.5" x 9" | Weight: 5.4 lbs | Volume: 46 L.

DURABLE & ECO-FRIENDLY: Made from stain-resistant polyester with water-resistant DuraGuard coating and ergonomic, high-strength zippers for lasting durability. Interior lining uses recycled plastics and stays protected from moisture with H2O Guard.

EFFORTLESS MOBILITY: 360° spinner wheels ensure smooth rolling in any direction. The lightweight PowerScope Lite handle with stops at 38" and 42.5" and a contour grip offers comfort and control. Bottom tray design boosts durability and stability.

EXPANDABLE & ORGANIZED: Expands up to 2" for added space and stability. Features top, side, and bottom handles, two exterior pockets, full-length lid pocket, side accessory pocket, and adjustable hold-down straps for organized packing.

LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY: Limited Lifetime Coverage plus the Trusted Companion Promise covers repair for damage caused by airlines or other common carriers for one year when registered after purchase.
product_description: Travel light and move easily with this ultra-lightweight, durable 21-inch expandable carry-on spinner. Designed for comfort and effortless mobility, it features a 2-position adjustable PowerScope Lite handle with a patented Contour Grip and 360° spinner wheels for smooth rolling in any direction. Two exterior quick-access pockets, a full-length interior lid pocket, side accessory pocket, and adjustable hold-down straps keep your belongings organized. A high-tensile-strength expandable zipper provides up to 2 inches of extra packing space. Sizer bin tested to fit in the overhead bins of most major U.S. airlines. Backed by Travelpro’s Limited Lifetime Coverage and 1-year Trusted Companion Promise, covering repairs and shipping for airline or carrier damage.
